author: Special Correspondent
text:
Vashishta Johri, General Manager, Southern Railway, carrying out a window inspection from a special coach on the Tiruchi-Villupuram line on Wednesday.— PHOTO: A. MURALITHARAN

Southern Railway General Manager Vashishta Johri carried out a “window trailing” inspection from Tiruchi to Villupuram on Wednesday.

Seated in an Inspection Car attached to the Chennai-bound Vaigai Express from Madurai, Mr. Johri’s inspection was to assess the performance of technical aspects, including riding quality, track condition, and signals.

The inspection car is attached on the rear side of the express train to enable the General Manager observe during the course of his inspection.

The General Manager watched the ongoing works and any abnormality witnessed in the section, railway officials said.

Divisional Railway Manager A.K. Agarwal accompanied the General Manager up to Villupuram.
title: Johri inspects Tiruchi– Villupuram section
